# WEAPON::GET_WEAPON_COMPONENT_VARIANT_EXTRA_MODEL

## Summary
Returns the model hash at the given index in the variant model info extra components array

## Parameters
* **WEAPONCOMPONENT_TYPE** weaponComponent
* **INT** extraComponentIndex

## Returns
* **MODEL_NAMES**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the model hash of the extra component at specified index.
